casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ray Charles STRICKLAND. No. 92P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2016. Ray Charles Strickland, for Strickland, Ray Charles. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 16th of March 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Richmond County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
